xwikidoc.title: Design Test: BogoSAT
xwikidoc.content:
{{info}} Design the homepage of an XWiki-based intranet for the employees of a company called BogoSAT (a TV channel). The intranet provides the following features: * a forum * a ticketing service where employees can report problems (each ticket has a title, a description, a reporter, a status //open|inprogress|closed//, a reporting date and a resolution date) * a product catalog * a collection of tutorials * a collection of quizzes
Restrictions: * simple, content-oriented design * the top of the homepage header must be reusable as it is on content pages {{/info}}
